commit.message:
re PR libstdc++/13838 (std::bitset<>::operator |= error with -D_GLIBCXX_DEBUG)

2004-01-23  Paolo Carlini  <pcarlini@suse.de>

	PR libstdc++/13838
	* include/debug/bitset (operator|=): Fix typo.
	* testsuite/23_containers/bitset/operations/13838.cc: New.

From-SVN: r76479
